description: Gets information about an Amazon Kendra thesaurus.

parameters.name: Id
parameters.description: The identifier of the thesaurus you want to get information on.

parameters.name: IndexId
parameters.description: The identifier of the index for the thesaurus.

nested_items.name: IndexId
nested_items.description: The identifier of the index for the thesaurus.

nested_items.name: Status
nested_items.description: The current status of the thesaurus. When the value is ACTIVE, queries are able to use the thesaurus. If the Status field value is FAILED, the ErrorMessage field provides more information.

nested_items.name: ErrorMessage
nested_items.description: When the Status field value is FAILED, the ErrorMessage field provides more information.

nested_items.name: CreatedAt
nested_items.description: The Unix timestamp when the thesaurus was created.

nested_items.name: UpdatedAt
nested_items.description: The Unix timestamp when the thesaurus was last updated.

nested_items.name: RoleArn
nested_items.description: An IAM role that gives Amazon Kendra permissions to access thesaurus file specified in SourceS3Path.

nested_items.name: SourceS3Path
nested_items.description: Information required to find a specific file in an Amazon S3 bucket.

nested_items.name: Bucket
nested_items.description: The name of the S3 bucket that contains the file.

nested_items.name: FileSizeBytes
nested_items.description: The size of the thesaurus file in bytes.

nested_items.name: TermCount
nested_items.description: The number of unique terms in the thesaurus file. For example, the synonyms a,b,c and a=>d, the term count would be 4.

nested_items.name: SynonymRuleCount
nested_items.description: The number of synonym rules in the thesaurus file.
